oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Centennial Exposition, Nashville, Tennessee, 1897 / The Henderson Litho. Co., Cincinnati.
Centennial Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bird's-eye view of the Exposition's grounds.

The 1897 Centennial Expositions was designed to honor the 100th anniversary of Tennessee's statehood, however, it was also an opportunity to honor Confederate and Union veterans of the Civil War. Highlights of the Exposition included a cyclorama of the Battle of Gettysburg and the display of memorabilia from the war.

The Persistence of Memory
